title: add hand tool for viewing pdfs
body:
similar to adobe reader I'd like to be able to manoeuvre through the pdf by using the mouse.
click+drag to move/scroll through the pdf-page

comments.body: I mean, I dont't even want to move away my right hand which is over the mouse. Im just too lazy to do that
I hate edge just because you cannot clik and drag the pdf page. I like to read pdf files using one hand while while with the other hand I hold my coffe cup. Edge don't let me do that.
